about_the_game:
"Backrooms: Maintenance" is a first-person horror adventure game where players take on the role of a brave maintenance worker, exploring the mysterious Backrooms Corporation, solving puzzles, and completing tasks assigned by your boss.

Main Gameplay:

Exploration and Survival: Explore the labyrinthine backrooms, find clues, solve puzzles, and evade unknown dangers.
Tasks: Complete tasks (assigned by the manager), and uncover the truth hidden behind the backrooms.
Game Modes:

Single Player: Face the terror of the backrooms alone, experiencing a thrilling adventure.
Multiplayer: Collaborate with other players to explore, help each other, and face challenges together.
Key Features:

Dynamic Environment: The backroom environment changes with your exploration, filled with unknowns and surprises.
Realistic Sound Effects: Lifelike sound design immerses you in the game, making you feel the horror in every detail.
Rich Content: A vast level, various puzzles, ensuring the game's diversity and challenge.

Tasks: Complete tasks (assigned by the manager), and uncover the truth hidden behind the backrooms.

Multiplayer: Collaborate with other players to explore, help each other, and face challenges together.

Realistic Sound Effects: Lifelike sound design immerses you in the game, making you feel the horror in every detail.

name: 后室：维修工（Backrooms: Maintenance）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X @ 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 460 with 2 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K @ 3.7 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 @ 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 5700 with 8 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard

short_description: Welcome to the back office company. I am your manager, Carl. Please complete the task assigned by your superiors. Oh, by the way, be careful, any possible loss will cause damage to the company's property.
